items.title: Nacho Gonzalez wants to show you Patagonia
items.excerpt: Nacho Gonzalez discovered his dream job in a bar in Buenos Aires. Chatting with an Intrepid trip leader from the Netherlands, he told her, ‘I don’t know what you do, but I want that.’

items.title: Our intrepid love story: Why we chose to go on honeymoon with a group of strangers
items.excerpt: Vanessa and Mark have always felt a calling to explore – whether that’s in their homeland of Scotland or the wilds of Patagonia. After a very Intrepid engagement in Malaysia, they vowed to make married life an adventure – starting with the honeymoon. We set off from base camp …
